TEXT.Spanish: Cada ciudadano del asentamiento precisa 2 Alimentos por turno. Si no tenéis bastantes Alimentos disponibles, los ciudadanos saldrán al mapa principal del juego hasta que haya Alimentos suficientes para mantener a la población.

TEXT.English: You can load or unload your transport units from the Settlement Screen. In the "Transport" section of the Settlement Screen, all the transport units currently located in the same tile as your settlement are displayed. From here, you can click and drag any goods your transports are carrying onto the Goods display to add them to the settlement's stores. You can also click and drag any of the goods from the settlement onto the transport.
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez charger ou décharger vos unités de transport depuis l'écran de colonie. Dans la section "Transport", toutes les unités de transport actuellement présentes dans votre colonie sont affichées. Vous pouvez ensuite faire glisser et déposer n'importe quelle marchandise transportée par vos unités dans la fenêtre des marchandises afin de l'ajouter aux réserves de votre colonie. Vous pouvez également faire glisser et déposer n'importe quelle marchandise depuis votre colonie jusqu'à l'une de vos unités de transport.
TEXT.German: Auf dem Siedlungsbildschirm kã¶nnen Sie Ihre Transporteinheiten be- oder entladen. Im Transport-Bereich werden alle Transporteinheiten angezeigt, die sich aktuell auf demselben Gelã¤ndefeld wie Ihre Siedlung befinden. Hier kã¶nnen Sie alle Gã¼ter, die sich auf Transportmitteln befinden, per Mausklick in die Gã¼teranzeige ziehen und sie zu den Vorrã¤ten Ihrer Siedlung hinzufã¼gen. Sie kã¶nnen auch jedes Gut aus der Siedlung auf das Transportmittel ziehen.
TEXT.Italian: Puoi caricare e scaricare le unitã di trasporto dalla schermata dell'insediamento. Nella sezione "trasporti" della schermata dell'insediamento vengono visualizzate tutte le unitã di trasporto attualmente nella stessa casella del tuo insediamento. Da qui puoi cliccare e trascinare i beni sui tuoi trasporti nella finestra dei beni, per aggiungerli alle riserve dell'insediamento. Puoi anche cliccare su qualsiasi bene e trascinarlo dall'insediamento su un trasporto.
TEXT.Spanish: Podã©is cargar y descargar las unidades de transporte desde la pantalla del asentamiento. En la secciã³n "Transporte" de la pantalla del asentamiento, se muestran todas las unidades de transporte ubicadas en la misma casilla que vuestro asentamiento. Ahã­, podã©is hacer clic y arrastrar cualquier mercancã­a que estã©n llevando vuestros transportes al visor de mercancã­as para aã±adirla a los almacenes del asentamiento. Tambiã©n podã©is hacer clic y arrastrar cualquiera de las mercancã­as del asentamiento al transporte.

TEXT.English: To assign a citizen to the Scout, Soldier, or Dragoon combat profession you must have Horses or Weapons available. Scouts require 5 horses; Soldiers require 50 weapons; Dragoons require 50 of each.
TEXT.French: Pour attribuer les professions militaires de soldat ou de dragon à un citoyen, vous devez disposer de chevaux et d'armes. Les explorateurs requièrent 5 chevaux, les soldats 50 armes, et les dragons 50 de chaque.
TEXT.German: Um einem Bürger den Späher-, Soldaten- oder Dragonerberuf zuzuweisen, müssen Ihnen Pferde oder Waffen zur Verfügung stehen. Späher erfordern 5 Pferde; Soldaten erfordern 50 Waffen; Dragoner erfordern 50 Pferde und 50 Waffen.
TEXT.Italian: Per assegnare un cittadino alle professioni militari di scout, soldato o dragone devi avere a disposizione armi o cavalli. Per gli scout servono 5 cavalli, per i soldati 50 armi, per i dragoni 50 di entrambi.
TEXT.Spanish: Para asignarle la profesión de combate Batidor, Soldado o Dragón a una unidad debéis tener disponibles Caballos o Mosquetes. Los Batidores necesitan 5 Caballos; los Soldados, 50 Mosquetes; y los Dragones, 50 de cada.

TEXT.English: The Colonization Civilopedia is rife with gameplay and historical information and should be your first stop should you have any questions. You can visit it by pressing [F12], clicking the "Civilopedia" icon, or by selecting it on the Main Menu.
TEXT.French: La Civilopédia de Colonization est truffée d'informations historiques et de conseils de jeu. N'hésitez pas à la consulter dès que vous vous posez des questions. Pour ce faire, appuyez sur [F12], cliquez sur l'icône Civilopédia ou sélectionnez-la dans le menu principal.
TEXT.German: The Colonization Civilopedia is rife with gameplay and historical information and should be your first stop should you have any questions. You can visit it by pressing [F12], clicking the "Civilopedia" icon, or by selecting it on the Main Menu.
TEXT.Italian: The Colonization Civilopedia is rife with gameplay and historical information and should be your first stop should you have any questions. You can visit it by pressing [F12], clicking the "Civilopedia" icon, or by selecting it on the Main Menu.
TEXT.Spanish: The Colonization Civilopedia is rife with gameplay and historical information and should be your first stop should you have any questions. You can visit it by pressing [F12], clicking the "Civilopedia" icon, or by selecting it on the Main Menu.

TEXT.English: If you produce more goods than you are able to store, then the remaining goods will begin to spoil and disappear. Be sure to build Warehouses and make regular shipments so that your colonists' hard work will not be wasted.
TEXT.French: Si vous produisez davantage de marchandises que vous n'êtes capable d'en stocker, la marchandise excédentaire commencera à se détériorer et finira par disparaître. Assurez-vous de construire des entrepôts et d'organiser des transports de fret réguliers afin que vos fidèles colons n'aient pas travaillé pour rien.
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie mehr Güter produzieren, als Sie lagern können, verderben die übrigen Güter und verschwinden. Achten Sie darauf, Lagergebäude zu errichten und Güter regelmäßig zu verschiffen, damit die harte Arbeit Ihrer Kolonisten nicht umsonst ist.
TEXT.Italian: Se produci più beni di quelli che puoi immagazzinare, quelli in più cominceranno a rovinarsi e scompariranno. Assicurati di costruire magazzini e di fare spedizioni regolari, in modo da non sprecare il risultato del duro lavoro dei tuoi coloni.
TEXT.Spanish: Si producís más mercancías de las que podáis almacenar, las restantes empezarán a echarse a perder y desaparecer poco a poco. No dejéis de construir Almacenes y hacer envíos regulares, para que no se eche a perder el duro trabajo de los Colonos.

TEXT.English: Native units have no regard for your silly "borders" and will freely enter your territory and your settlements.
TEXT.French: Les unités indigènes n'ont que faire de ces stupides histoires de frontières. Ils entreront librement dans votre territoire et dans vos colonies.
TEXT.German: Ureinwohner-Einheiten kümmern sich nicht um Ihre albernen "Grenzen" und bewegen sich frei durch Ihr Territorium und Ihre Siedlungen.
TEXT.Italian: Le unità dei nativi non badano a cose ridicole come i tuoi "confini" ed entreranno liberamente nei tuoi territori e insediamenti.
TEXT.Spanish: A las unidades nativas les importan un comino las tontas fronteras, y entrarán libremente en vuestro territorio y asentamiento.

TEXT.English: If during the first era, your borders will not evolve, from the second you need to manage your influence to avoid possible conflicts. Click on the icon "Territorial Influence."
TEXT.French: Si durant la première ère, vos frontières n'évolueront pas, à partir de la deuxième vous devrez gérer votre influence afin d'éviter d'éventuels conflits. Cliquez sur le pictogramme "Influence Territoriale".
TEXT.German: If during the first era, your borders will not evolve, from the second you need to manage your influence to avoid possible conflicts. Click on the icon "Territorial Influence."
TEXT.Italian: If during the first era, your borders will not evolve, from the second you need to manage your influence to avoid possible conflicts. Click on the icon "Territorial Influence."
TEXT.Spanish: If during the first era, your borders will not evolve, from the second you need to manage your influence to avoid possible conflicts. Click on the icon "Territorial Influence."

TEXT.English: If you try to build a colony too close to a native settlement, the local chief may require you to purchase the land you are claiming. You can refuse to pay, of course, but this will certainly worsen relations between you and the natives.
TEXT.French: Si vous tentez de fonder une ville trop près d'une colonie indigène, il se peut que le chef local vous demande d'acheter les terres que vous tentez de récupérer. Vous pouvez refuser de payer, bien entendu, mais cela entachera vos relations avec les indigènes concernés.
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie versuchen, eine Kolonie zu nahe an einer Ureinwohner-Siedlung zu errichten, bietet Ihnen der einheimische Häuptling vielleicht das Land, das Sie beanspruchen, zum Kauf an. Wenn Sie sich weigern zu zahlen, so hat das eindeutig negative Auswirkungen auf Ihre Beziehung zu den Ureinwohnern.
TEXT.Italian: Se provi a costruire una colonia troppo vicino a un insediamento di nativi, il capo potrebbe chiederti di acquistare la terra che rivendichi. Puoi naturalmente rifiutarti di pagare, ma ciò peggiorerà le relazioni con i nativi.
TEXT.Spanish: Si intentáis construir una colonia demasiado cerca de un asentamiento indígena, el jefe del lugar puede que os exija comprar la tierra de las que os estáis apoderando. Obviamente, os podéis negar a pagar, pero seguro que ello empeorará vuestra relación con los Nativos.

TEXT.English: Without a Warehouse, your settlement can only store 100 of any given type of good except Food. A Warehouse increases capacity to 300. A Warehouse Expansion ups your settlement's storage to 500.
TEXT.French: Sans entrepôt, une colonie ne peut stocker que 100 unités d'une marchandise, excepté pour la nourriture. Un entrepôt fait passer cette limite à 250 et une extension d'entrepôt à 500.
TEXT.German: Ohne Lagerhaus kann Ihre Siedlung nur 100 Einheiten eines bestimmten Guts, mit Ausnahme von Nahrung, lagern. Ein Lagerhaus erhöht die Lagerkapazität Ihrer Siedlung auf 300, eine Lagerhauserweiterung auf 500.
TEXT.Italian: Senza un magazzino, il tuo insediamento può mettere da parte solo 100 unità di qualsiasi bene, a parte il cibo. Un magazzino aumenta la capacità a 300. L'espansione del magazzino porta la capacità del tuo insediamento a 500.
TEXT.Spanish: Sin un Almacén, vuestro asentamiento solo puede guardar 100 de cualquier tipo de mercancías, excepto Alimentos. Un Almacén aumenta la capacidad a 300. El Almacén ampliado sube la capacidad de almacenamiento del asentamiento a 500.

TEXT.English: The cannons are powerful weapons that can weaken enemy units. However, they are very vulnerable and can not defend themselves. Be sure to always protect your artillery units.
TEXT.French: Les canons sont de puissantes armes qui permettent d'affaiblir des unités adverses. Cependant, ils sont très vulnérables et ne peuvent se défendre seuls. Veillez à protéger systématiquement vos unités d'artillerie.
TEXT.German: The cannons are powerful weapons that can weaken enemy units. However, they are very vulnerable and can not defend themselves. Be sure to always protect your artillery units.
TEXT.Italian: The cannons are powerful weapons that can weaken enemy units. However, they are very vulnerable and can not defend themselves. Be sure to always protect your artillery units.
TEXT.Spanish: The cannons are powerful weapons that can weaken enemy units. However, they are very vulnerable and can not defend themselves. Be sure to always protect your artillery units.

TEXT.English: As the ships that need a crew, the cannons need artillery men and ammunition to be functional. Any colon can become artillery man but professional units can be recruited in Europe.
TEXT.French: Comme les navires qui ont besoin d'un équipage, les canons ont besoin d'artilleurs et de munitions pour être fonctionnels. N'importe quel colon peut devenir artilleur mais des unités professionnelles peuvent être enrôlées en Europe.
TEXT.German: As the ships that need a crew, the cannons need artillery men and ammunition to be functional. Any colon can become artillery man but professional units can be recruited in Europe.
TEXT.Italian: As the ships that need a crew, the cannons need artillery men and ammunition to be functional. Any colon can become artillery man but professional units can be recruited in Europe.
TEXT.Spanish: As the ships that need a crew, the cannons need artillery men and ammunition to be functional. Any colon can become artillery man but professional units can be recruited in Europe.

TEXT.English: Beware of pirates. Unattached nor nation, the pirates are common enemies to all nations. If you do not protect your merchant ships with warships organized in convoy, your wealth will be in great danger.
TEXT.French: Attention aux pirates. Sans attache, ni nation, les pirates sont les ennemis communs à toutes les nations. Si vous ne protégez pas vos navires marchands avec des vaisseaux de guerre et en vous organisant en convoi, vos richesses seront en grand danger.
TEXT.German: Beware of pirates. Unattached nor nation, the pirates are common enemies to all nations. If you do not protect your merchant ships with warships organized in convoy, your wealth will be in great danger.
TEXT.Italian: Beware of pirates. Unattached nor nation, the pirates are common enemies to all nations. If you do not protect your merchant ships with warships organized in convoy, your wealth will be in great danger.
TEXT.Spanish: Beware of pirates. Unattached nor nation, the pirates are common enemies to all nations. If you do not protect your merchant ships with warships organized in convoy, your wealth will be in great danger.

TEXT.English: Galleons are the finest transport ships available and the only ships capable of transporting Treasure units to Europe.
TEXT.French: Les galions sont les navires de transport disponibles les plus performants. Ils sont notamment les seuls à pouvoir transporter les trésors en Europe.
TEXT.German: Galeonen sind die besten verfügbaren Transportschiffe und die einzigen, die Schatzeinheiten nach Europa bringen können.
TEXT.Italian: I galeoni sono le migliori navi da trasporto disponibili e sono le uniche in grado di trasportare i tesori in Europa.
TEXT.Spanish: Los Galeones son los mejores barcos de transporte y los únicos capaces de llevar unidades de Tesoro a Europa.

TEXT.English: The Drydock and the Shipyard allow you to build ships in your settlement. The Drydock allows the Caravel, Merchantman, Galleon, and Privateer to be constructed, while the Shipyard allows for the Frigate and Ship of the Line to be built.
TEXT.French: Les cales sèches et les chantiers navals vous permettent de fabriquer des navires. Les cales sèches donnent accès à la caravelle, au navire marchand, au galion au navire d'escorte, tandis que le chantier naval vous permet d'ordonner la construction de frégates.
TEXT.German: Das Trockendock und die Schiffswerft ermöglichen Ihnen den Bau von Schiffen in Ihrer Siedlung. Das Trockendock ermöglicht den Bau von Karavelle, Kauffahrer, Galeone und Freibeuter, während die Schiffswerft den Bau von Fregatte und Linienschiff ermöglicht.
TEXT.Italian: Il bacino di carenaggio e il cantiere navale ti permettono di costruire navi nell'insediamento. Con il bacino di carenaggio puoi costruire caravelle, mercantili, galeoni e navi corsare, mentre il cantiere navale permette la costruzione di fregate e navi da prima linea.
TEXT.Spanish: El Dique seco y el Astillero os permiten construir barcos en vuestro asentamiento. El Dique seco permite construir la Carabela, el Mercante, el Galeón y el Corsario; mientras que el Astillero da acceso a la Fragata y a la Corbeta.

TEXT.English: To load goods onto a transport, you must move the transport unit into the same tile as the goods and press the "Load Goods" icon. You can also do it from the "Transport" section of the Settlement screen.
TEXT.French: Pour charger des marchandises dans une unité de transport, vous devez déplacer cette dernière sur la même case que les marchandises puis cliquer sur l'icône Charger des marchandises. Vous pouvez également le faire depuis l'espace Transport de l'écran de colonie.
TEXT.German: Um Güter auf ein Transportmittel zu laden, müssen Sie die Transporteinheit auf dasselbe Geländefeld wie die Güter bewegen und auf "Beladen" klicken. Dies ist ebenfalls im Menü "Transport" im Siedlungsbildschirm möglich.
TEXT.Italian: Per caricare dei beni su un trasporto devi prima spostare l'unità da trasporto nella stessa casella in cui si trovano i beni, per poi cliccare sull'icona "Carica beni". Puoi anche farlo dalla sezione "Trasporti" nella schermata dell'insediamento.
TEXT.Spanish: Para cargar mercancías en un transporte, debéis llevar la unidad de transporte a la misma casilla en la que estén las mercancías y pulsar en el icono "Cargar mercancías". También podéis hacerlo en la sección de "Transporte", en la pantalla del asentamiento.

TEXT.English: The DoaNE Mod gives pride to the production of raw materials. The Europeans are not interested in the manufactured products. Those products will only serve for domestic consumption and trade with Native American tribes.
TEXT.French: Le Mod DoaNE fait la part belle à la production de matières premières. Les européens ne sont pas intéressés par les produits transformés. La production des produits finis ne servira qu'à la consommation intérieure et au commerce avec les tribus amérindiennes.
TEXT.German: The DoaNE Mod gives pride to the production of raw materials. The Europeans are not interested in the manufactured products. Those products will only serve for domestic consumption and trade with Native American tribes.
TEXT.Italian: The DoaNE Mod gives pride to the production of raw materials. The Europeans are not interested in the manufactured products. Those products will only serve for domestic consumption and trade with Native American tribes.
TEXT.Spanish: The DoaNE Mod gives pride to the production of raw materials. The Europeans are not interested in the manufactured products. Those products will only serve for domestic consumption and trade with Native American tribes.

TEXT.English: Farms are created by the pioneer, but agronomists will evolve farm levels. Their work is neither free nor necessarily fast.
TEXT.French: Les fermes sont créees par le pionnier, mais c'est l'agronome qui vous fera évoluer les niveaux de production. Son travail n'est ni gratuit, ni forcément rapide.
TEXT.German: Farms are created by the pioneer, but agronomists will evolve farm levels. Their work is neither free nor necessarily fast.
TEXT.Italian: Farms are created by the pioneer, but agronomists will evolve farm levels. Their work is neither free nor necessarily fast.
TEXT.Spanish: Farms are created by the pioneer, but agronomists will evolve farm levels. Their work is neither free nor necessarily fast.

TEXT.English: DoaNE integrates latitudes. They are essential to the research of ideal land for certain crops. Don't plant them any-where and try to find the best location for an optimal production.
TEXT.French: DoaNE intègre les latitudes. Elles sont essentielles à la recherche des terres idéales pour certaines cultures. Alors ne plantez pas n'importe-où et recherchez le meilleur emplacement pour une production optimale.
TEXT.German: DoaNE integrates latitudes. They are essential to the research of ideal land for certain crops. Don't plant them any-where and try to find the best location for an optimal production.
TEXT.Italian: DoaNE integrates latitudes. They are essential to the research of ideal land for certain crops. Don't plant them any-where and try to find the best location for an optimal production.
TEXT.Spanish: DoaNE integrates latitudes. They are essential to the research of ideal land for certain crops. Don't plant them any-where and try to find the best location for an optimal production.

TEXT.English: The medical office is used to treat wounded soldiers. If you have clothes, do not forget to build one.
TEXT.French: L'office médical permet de soigner les soldats bléssés. Si vous disposez de tissus, n'oubliez pas d'en construire un.
TEXT.German: The medical office is used to treat wounded soldiers. If you have clothes, do not forget to build one.
TEXT.Italian: The medical office is used to treat wounded soldiers. If you have clothes, do not forget to build one.
TEXT.Spanish: The medical office is used to treat wounded soldiers. If you have clothes, do not forget to build one.

TEXT.English: You can choose immigrants you need in Europe. A practical system allow you to a specific number of units (1, 2, 3 or infinity) you want. You can suspend your demands when you want.
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez choisir les immigrants dont vous avez besoin en Europe. Un système pratique permet de fixer la recherche d'unités en précisant la quantité (1, 2 ou 3 & infini) que vous souhaitez puis de suspendre vos demandes quand vous le souhaitez.
TEXT.German: You can choose immigrants you need in Europe. A practical system allow you to a specific number of units (1, 2, 3 or infinity) you want. You can suspend your demands when you want.
TEXT.Italian: You can choose immigrants you need in Europe. A practical system allow you to a specific number of units (1, 2, 3 or infinity) you want. You can suspend your demands when you want.
TEXT.Spanish: You can choose immigrants you need in Europe. A practical system allow you to a specific number of units (1, 2, 3 or infinity) you want. You can suspend your demands when you want.

TEXT.English: The commercial part in Europe allows to have the current price (sale & purchase), but also the quantity available. Just click on the "Gold" or "weight" to see this information.
TEXT.French: La partie commerciale en Europe permet d'avoir, non seulement les prix en cours (vente & achat), mais aussi les quantités disponibles. Il suffit de cliquer sur "Or" ou "Poids" pour voir ces informations.
TEXT.German: The commercial part in Europe allows to have the current price (sale & purchase), but also the quantity available. Just click on the "Gold" or "weight" to see this information.
TEXT.Italian: The commercial part in Europe allows to have the current price (sale & purchase), but also the quantity available. Just click on the "Gold" or "weight" to see this information.
TEXT.Spanish: The commercial part in Europe allows to have the current price (sale & purchase), but also the quantity available. Just click on the "Gold" or "weight" to see this information.

TEXT.English: A practical system categorizes units waiting in the colony garnison. Five columns exist: Settlers, Military, Wagon, Ships and Automatic trade.
TEXT.French: Un système pratique classe par catégorie les unités en attente dans la "zone de transit" de la colonie. Cinq colonnes les séparent : Colons, Militaires, Chariots, Navires & Commerce Automatique.
TEXT.German: A practical system categorizes units waiting in the colony garnison. Five columns exist: Settlers, Military, Wagon, Ships and Automatic trade.
TEXT.Italian: A practical system categorizes units waiting in the colony garnison. Five columns exist: Settlers, Military, Wagon, Ships and Automatic trade.
TEXT.Spanish: A practical system categorizes units waiting in the colony garnison. Five columns exist: Settlers, Military, Wagon, Ships and Automatic trade.

TEXT.English: Maintain good relations with the Indians is essential to secure a sustainable life on their land. Give them tools or goods regularly. Do not hesitate to propose exchanges of resources that will help you achieve substentiels profits and to sign some lucrative commercial contracts.
TEXT.French: Entretenir de bons rapports avec les indiens est essentiel pour se fixer durablement sur leur terre. Offrez-leur des outils ou marchandises régulièrement. N'hésitez pas à proposer des échanges de ressources qui vous permettront de réaliser de substentiels profits et de signer des contrats commerciaux souvent très lucratifs.
TEXT.German: Maintain good relations with the Indians is essential to secure a sustainable life on their land. Give them tools or goods regularly. Do not hesitate to propose exchanges of resources that will help you achieve substentiels profits and to sign some lucrative commercial contracts.
TEXT.Italian: Maintain good relations with the Indians is essential to secure a sustainable life on their land. Give them tools or goods regularly. Do not hesitate to propose exchanges of resources that will help you achieve substentiels profits and to sign some lucrative commercial contracts.
TEXT.Spanish: Maintain good relations with the Indians is essential to secure a sustainable life on their land. Give them tools or goods regularly. Do not hesitate to propose exchanges of resources that will help you achieve substentiels profits and to sign some lucrative commercial contracts.

TEXT.English: The Indians are not interested in gold. Bring their some goods, tools, fabrics, and all manufactured products.
TEXT.French: Les indiens ne sont pas intéressés par de l'or. Apportez-leur des marchandises, outils, tissus, et tout produits manufacturés.
TEXT.German: The Indians are not interested in gold. Bring their some goods, tools, fabrics, and all manufactured products.
TEXT.Italian: The Indians are not interested in gold. Bring their some goods, tools, fabrics, and all manufactured products.
TEXT.Spanish: The Indians are not interested in gold. Bring their some goods, tools, fabrics, and all manufactured products.

TEXT.English: There are four eras in DoaNE. Evolution of weapons, ships, buildings. Use the maximum of each.
TEXT.French: Il y a quatre ères dans DoaNE. Evolution des armes, des navires, des bâtiments. Exploitez au maximum chacune d'elles.
TEXT.German: There are four eras in DoaNE. Evolution of weapons, ships, buildings. Use the maximum of each.
TEXT.Italian: There are four eras in DoaNE. Evolution of weapons, ships, buildings. Use the maximum of each.
TEXT.Spanish: There are four eras in DoaNE. Evolution of weapons, ships, buildings. Use the maximum of each.

TEXT.English: If you have only ordinary soldiers to defend your colonies, do not play reckless with Amerindian natives. At the first era, they are much more numerous and powerful than you.
TEXT.French: Si vous ne possédez que de simples soldats pour défendre vos colonies, ne jouez pas les téméraires avec les natifs amérindiens. A l'ère 1, ils sont bien plus nombreux et puissants que vous.
TEXT.German: If you have only ordinary soldiers to defend your colonies, do not play reckless with Amerindian natives. At the first era, they are much more numerous and powerful than you.
TEXT.Italian: If you have only ordinary soldiers to defend your colonies, do not play reckless with Amerindian natives. At the first era, they are much more numerous and powerful than you.
TEXT.Spanish: If you have only ordinary soldiers to defend your colonies, do not play reckless with Amerindian natives. At the first era, they are much more numerous and powerful than you.

TEXT.English: The explorer who discovered new lands must transmit its findings to your civilization if you want to benefit. Bring it in one of your colonies to update your maps.
TEXT.French: L'explorateur qui découvre de nouvelles terres doit impérativement transmettre ses découvertes à votre civilisation si vous souhaitez en bénéficier. Ramenez-le dans une de vos colonies pour mettre à jour vos cartes.
TEXT.German: The explorer who discovered new lands must transmit its findings to your civilization if you want to benefit. Bring it in one of your colonies to update your maps.
TEXT.Italian: The explorer who discovered new lands must transmit its findings to your civilization if you want to benefit. Bring it in one of your colonies to update your maps.
TEXT.Spanish: The explorer who discovered new lands must transmit its findings to your civilization if you want to benefit. Bring it in one of your colonies to update your maps.

TEXT.English: Explorers and ships can give maps. Feel free to use it to send your discoveries faster.
TEXT.French: Les explorateurs et les navires peuvent se transmettre les cartes. N'hésitez pas à en user pour faire parvenir plus rapidement vos découvertes.
TEXT.German: Explorers and ships can give maps. Feel free to use it to send your discoveries faster.
TEXT.Italian: Explorers and ships can give maps. Feel free to use it to send your discoveries faster.
TEXT.Spanish: Explorers and ships can give maps. Feel free to use it to send your discoveries faster.

TEXT.English: Explorers know how to get seedlings from the native Indians. When you will have it, those seedlings will be directly available for your civilization.
TEXT.French: Les explorateurs pourront obtenir des plants en visitant les villages des natifs. Lorsque vous en détiendrez, ces plants seront immédiatement disponibles pour votre civilisation.
TEXT.German: Explorers know how to get seedlings from the native Indians. When you will have it, those seedlings will be directly available for your civilization.
TEXT.Italian: Explorers know how to get seedlings from the native Indians. When you will have it, those seedlings will be directly available for your civilization.
TEXT.Spanish: Explorers know how to get seedlings from the native Indians. When you will have it, those seedlings will be directly available for your civilization.

TEXT.English: When an immigrant arrives at the staging area, you must make a decision. Either you accept the price, or you negotiate. If you are agree, it goes on the docks and is awaiting departure. Do not wait too long, it may get impatient and leave.
TEXT.French: Lorsqu'un immigrant arrive sur la zone de transit, vous devez prendre une décision. Soit vous acceptez son prix, soit vous négociez. Si vous vous mettez d'accord, il passe sur les docks et attend son départ. N'attendez pas trop longtemps, il pourrait s'impatienter et repartir.
TEXT.German: When an immigrant arrives at the staging area, you must make a decision. Either you accept the price, or you negotiate. If you are agree, it goes on the docks and is awaiting departure. Do not wait too long, it may get impatient and leave.
TEXT.Italian: When an immigrant arrives at the staging area, you must make a decision. Either you accept the price, or you negotiate. If you are agree, it goes on the docks and is awaiting departure. Do not wait too long, it may get impatient and leave.
TEXT.Spanish: When an immigrant arrives at the staging area, you must make a decision. Either you accept the price, or you negotiate. If you are agree, it goes on the docks and is awaiting departure. Do not wait too long, it may get impatient and leave.

TEXT.English: During a successful fight on the seas, you have to specify whether you want to keep the cargo, corrupt passengers and / or crew and keep the ship.
TEXT.French: Lors d'un combat victorieux sur les mers, vous aurez à définir si vous souhaitez garder la cargaison, corrompre les passagers et/ou l'équipage et conserver le navire.
TEXT.German: During a successful fight on the seas, you have to specify whether you want to keep the cargo, corrupt passengers and / or crew and keep the ship.
TEXT.Italian: During a successful fight on the seas, you have to specify whether you want to keep the cargo, corrupt passengers and / or crew and keep the ship.
TEXT.Spanish: During a successful fight on the seas, you have to specify whether you want to keep the cargo, corrupt passengers and / or crew and keep the ship.

TEXT.English: Pirates are good hunters. They know your trade routes. Keep an eye on the horizon!
TEXT.French: Les pirates sont de bons chasseurs. Ils connaissent parfaitement vos routes commerciales. Surveillez bien l'horizon !
TEXT.German: Pirates are good hunters. They know your trade routes. Keep an eye on the horizon!
TEXT.Italian: Pirates are good hunters. They know your trade routes. Keep an eye on the horizon!
TEXT.Spanish: Pirates are good hunters. They know your trade routes. Keep an eye on the horizon!

TEXT.English: By passing the mouse on the "Colonial attraction" parchment of the Immigration tab in Europe, you will have a detailed information of your colonies notoriety. Pay any attention to it, if you want to have a good immigration rate.
TEXT.French: En passant la souris sur le parchemin "Attrait Colonial" de l'onglet Immigration en Europe, vous aurez une information détaillée de la notoriété de vos colonies. Faites-y attention si vous souhaitez avoir un taux d'immigration satisfaisant.
TEXT.German: By passing the mouse on the "Colonial attraction" parchment of the Immigration tab in Europe, you will have a detailed information of your colonies notoriety. Pay any attention to it, if you want to have a good immigration rate.
TEXT.Italian: By passing the mouse on the "Colonial attraction" parchment of the Immigration tab in Europe, you will have a detailed information of your colonies notoriety. Pay any attention to it, if you want to have a good immigration rate.
TEXT.Spanish: By passing the mouse on the "Colonial attraction" parchment of the Immigration tab in Europe, you will have a detailed information of your colonies notoriety. Pay any attention to it, if you want to have a good immigration rate.

TEXT.English: Visit the Amerindian villages with your scout and ask them to give you their corn, tobacco, cotton, cocoa and groundnuts plants.
TEXT.French: Visitez les villages amérindiens avec votre explorateur et demandez-leurs de vous remettre des plants de maïs, tabac, coton, cacao et d'arachide.
TEXT.German: Visit the Amerindian villages with your scout and ask them to give you their corn, tobacco, cotton, cocoa and groundnuts plants.
TEXT.Italian: Visit the Amerindian villages with your scout and ask them to give you their corn, tobacco, cotton, cocoa and groundnuts plants.
TEXT.Spanish: Visit the Amerindian villages with your scout and ask them to give you their corn, tobacco, cotton, cocoa and groundnuts plants.

TEXT.English: You can ask, your maritime convoys, to automatically transport the resources you want to sell in Europe. They will do round trips as convoy.
TEXT.French: Confiez à vos convois maritimes la charge de transporter automatiquement les ressources que vous souhaitez vendre en Europe. Ils réaliseront des allers-retours en groupe.
TEXT.German: You can ask, your maritime convoys, to automatically transport the resources you want to sell in Europe. They will do round trips as convoy.
TEXT.Italian: You can ask, your maritime convoys, to automatically transport the resources you want to sell in Europe. They will do round trips as convoy.
TEXT.Spanish: You can ask, your maritime convoys, to automatically transport the resources you want to sell in Europe. They will do round trips as convoy.

TEXT.English: Int the "Ship" tab in Europe, several crew categories may wish to join your ranks. When one of them is present, the price that you will claim is a good indicator of his skills.
TEXT.French: Dans l'onglet "Navire" en Europe, plusieurs catégories d'équipage peuvent souhaiter rejoindre vos rangs. Lorsque l'un deux se présentera, le prix qu'il vous réclamera sera un bon indicateur de ses compétences.
TEXT.German: Int the "Ship" tab in Europe, several crew categories may wish to join your ranks. When one of them is present, the price that you will claim is a good indicator of his skills.
TEXT.Italian: Int the "Ship" tab in Europe, several crew categories may wish to join your ranks. When one of them is present, the price that you will claim is a good indicator of his skills.
TEXT.Spanish: Int the "Ship" tab in Europe, several crew categories may wish to join your ranks. When one of them is present, the price that you will claim is a good indicator of his skills.
